channel.title: Map file not loading in HL2, HL2DM or CSS
channel.description:
I recently tried downloading, installing, and loading the map [[url]https://www.cstrike-planet.com/maps/969-fallingwater?p=3#posts][/url] onto HL2 via console, but it produced an error. The same was with every other download mirror I found; using CSS and HL2DM also didn't work.
It's a recreation of Frank Lloyd Wright's Fallingwater house. I'm an architecture student, thus my real desire to try this map out.
I've tried this before, on my old computer perhaps a few months ago, and it worked. I don't get why it isn't working now.
